amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to provide for tax credits for child care; enact a patient's bill of rights; propose initiatives in education and tax relief; and reserve all budget surpluses until Congress and the President agree on legislation relating to Social Security solvency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute that provides for tax credits for child care, enacts a patient bill of rights, assists school modernization financing, reserves all budget surpluses until Congress and the President agree on legislation relating to Social Security solvency; and maintains the Transportation Equity Act funding levels.
